questions.question_text_1: What best describes the Economic Census conducted by the government?
question_texts: What best describes the Economic Census conducted by the government?

options.option_text: It is infrequent, covering every household in the country.
Conducted every five years to capture data from all households.
A sampling-based survey done every year to gather household information.
Conducted once every ten years, capturing data from every single household.

questions.question_text_1: When would you most likely use a bar graph in Excel?
question_texts: When would you most likely use a bar graph in Excel?

options.option_text: To display the frequency distribution of categorical data
To illustrate the parts of a whole

question_texts: What are the roles that the Government plays in the economic circular flow model?

options.option_text: Both producer and consumer & moderator and participant

questions.question_text_1: Which of the following statements best describes the difference between a niche market and a mass market?
question_texts: Which of the following statements best describes the difference between a niche market and a mass market?

options.option_text: A niche market targets a small, specific group of customers with specializedneeds, while a mass market targets a large, broad group of customers with general needs.
A niche market involves offering lower-priced products to a wide audience,whereas a mass market involves offering high-end products to a small, exclusive group.
A niche market typically requires large-scale advertising campaigns to reach abroad audience, while a mass market relies on word-of-mouth and targeted marketing.
A niche market focuses on standard products that appeal to everyone, while amass market customizes products to fit individual customer preferences.

questions.question_text_1:
You oversee the inventory management of gear assemblies in a manufacturing facility. The particulars of the inventory are as follows: 
Starting Inventory: 100 units Daily Usage: 5 units Lead Time: 10 days Safety Stock: 20 units 
Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.
question_texts:
You oversee the inventory management of gear assemblies in a manufacturing facility. The particulars of the inventory are as follows: 
Starting Inventory: 100 units Daily Usage: 5 units Lead Time: 10 days Safety Stock: 20 units 
Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.

questions.question_text_1: Based on this information, At what inventory level should you trigger a re-order for gear assemblies?
question_texts: Based on this information, At what inventory level should you trigger a re-order for gear assemblies?

options.option_text: Initiate a re-order when the inventory level drops to 70 units
Initiate a re-order when the inventory level drops to 50 units
Initiate a re-order when the inventory level drops to 30 units
Initiate a re-order when the inventory level drops to 15 units
